i_will_call_back.text: Okay, I'll call you later. Bye!

invalid_age.text: Sorry the connection dropped for a second could you say your age again?

when_callback.text: When can I call you back?

sorry_wont_call.text: No problem, I take you off our calling list and I will make sure that you donâ€™t get a call from us. Have a good day!

random.text: Sorry the connection dropped for a second could you say it again?

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely hear you. I'll try to call you later! Bye!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: umm...No! I'm a real person, maybe we have a bad connection? Sorry about that.

first.text: Hi! My name is Sam, and I'm with BAS Insurance. How are you doing today?

random.text: This is Sam with BAS Insurance. How are you doing?
I'm Sam with BAS Insurance. How do you do?

first.text: Doing great, thank you for asking! I'm calling to inform you that we are offering the cheapest rates for life insurance policies. In order to qualify, I just need to ask one quick question. How old are you?

random.text: I'm calling to let you know that life insurance policy rates have come down up to 50 per ce'nt. And I just want to ask a question real quick. How old are you?
I'm calling because our life insurance policy rates have come down up to 50 per ce'nt. I just want to ask one question real quick. How old are you?

first.text: I'm calling to inform you that we are offering the cheapest rates for life insurance policies. In order to qualify, I just need to ask a question real quick. How old are you?

random.text: I'm calling to let you know that life insurance policy rates have come up to 50 per ce'nt for term life, whole life and final expense. And i just need to ask one quick question. How old are you?
I'm calling to let you know that life insurance policy rates have come up to 50 per ce'nt for term life, whole life and final expense. And i just need to ask one question real quick. How old are you?

bye.text: Great! Just stay on the line please.

bye_fail.text: I'm sorry you don't qualify, but thank you so much for your time! Good bye!

customer_consent.text: You seems like a perfect candidate. Kindly just bear with me for few seconds, I'm going to transfer your call to one of my specialist. Is that okay with you?

bye_common.text: Sorry if I bothered you, goodbye!
